description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'GestureBoardContainer' that wraps a child widget with gesture detection for swipe actions, integrating with a game provider to handle moves in a 2048 puzzle game.

classes.name: GestureBoardContainer
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that wraps its child with swipe detection capabilities to trigger game move actions.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, wrapping the child with SwipeDetector configured with gesture thresholds and callbacks.
